title: Program for Enhancing Scientific Inquiry Skills through Gamified Problem-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental scientific theories and experimental methods
context.additional_context: Large-scale collaborative learning environment utilizing smartphone-based VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform science problem-solving processes in a gamified environment with over 80% proficiency
Learners can replicate actual science experiment design and analysis processes with 90% accuracy through VR simulations
Learners improve collaborative skills by engaging in peer assessment and providing feedback at least three times during the problem-solving process.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
